feed.title: Simple Notes
feed.subtitle: Minimal personal blog built with Jekyll for GitHub Pages.

entry.title: Welcome
entry.content:
You made it! This is your first post. Edit it or add a new file in the _posts directory to publish something new. The filename should follow the YYYY-MM-DD-title.md pattern.

Jekyll will turn Markdown into HTML when the site builds, so keep writing in plain text and let the generator handle the rest.
entry.summary: You made it! This is your first post. Edit it or add a new file in the _posts directory to publish something new. The filename should follow the YYYY-MM-DD-title.md pattern.
